amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following new section: \ SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to amend the oath of allegiance required by section 337 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1448).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in the bill to amend the oath of allegiance taken by immigrants that become U.S. Citizens.
